title: Royal Enfield to recall 26,300 units of Classic 350 on faulty brake issue
description: Royal Enfield, the maker of Bullet Motorcycle has recalled 26,300 units of its most popular motorcycle the Classic 350 due to potential brake issue as a "precautionary measure"
